trailingComments.value: Detect CSS Animations support to detect element display/re-attach

leadingComments.value: Detect CSS Animations support to detect element display/re-attach

right.value: .resize-triggers, .resize-triggers > div, .contract-trigger:before { content: " "; display: block; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .resize-triggers > div { background: #eee; overflow: auto; } .contract-trigger:before { width: 200%; height: 200%; }
right.rawValue: .resize-triggers, .resize-triggers > div, .contract-trigger:before { content: " "; display: block; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .resize-triggers > div { background: #eee; overflow: auto; } .contract-trigger:before { width: 200%; height: 200%; }
right.raw: '.resize-triggers, .resize-triggers > div, .contract-trigger:before { content: \" \"; display: block; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .resize-triggers > div { background: #eee; overflow: auto; } .contract-trigger:before { width: 200%; height: 200%; }'

leadingComments.value: opacity:0 works around a chrome bug https://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=286360

trailingComments.value: Listen for a css animation to detect element display/re-attach
